column5: Just wanted to make a quick post...  I noticed today that PH0T08UCK3T introduced a "PRO" membership - thus, only allowing you to view a certain size/bandwidth of pictures/videos from the site itself for ONE DAYS USE. This presents a problem to many because, I know a lot of there are quite a few users on here that use PB...  My question is, what website do you use to post your pictures? and why?  Thanks, A2F
I use the "Bucket"! I have about 500 pics on there and have only used 10% of my alloted free member space... does that tell you anything?
I use myfishingpictures.com, it is free and has no limit to how many pics you can load.
I still use the Bucket too.
www.imageshack.us  No limits, no accounts, no Bull! Just choose your files and upload! Retrieve links and your good to go!
You should be okay with photobucket on this site. A few hundred image views won't be enough to kill your bandwidth.
photobucket is blocked by many corporate firewalls  use imageshack  best solution is to use your own.
